main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Woodside, California during the summer of 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed by a 7-year-old youth,The sighting lasted for about 2-3 minutes,The object was described as silvery and round, moving in a straight line at a tremendous speed,The object had a hazy grayish appearance and seemed to blend in with the overcast sky.
witness description: a young boy who saw the object
